text: Michael John Wilkins (born 6 May 1942) is an English former professional footballer who played as a centre forward. ==Career== Born in Leeds, Wilkins signed for Bradford City from Ashley Road Methodists in March 1959.Frost, p. 410 He made 1 league appearance for the club,Frost, p. 390 before being released in 1960. He later played for Canterbury City. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Canterbury City F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards
title: Mike Wilkins
